verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> when the number of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G4129>multiplied,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1675>Grecians<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1445>Hebrews,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> were <S%G3865>neglected<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2522>daily<s%> <S%G1248>ministration.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> unto them, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G701>reason<s%> that <S%G2248>we<s%> should <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1247>serve<s%> <S%G5132>tables.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G3767><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> look ye <S%G1980>out<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of honest <S%G3140>report,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we may <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5532>business.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> will give ourselves <S%G4342>continually<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G1799>the<s%> <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4402>Prochorus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3527>Nicanor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5096>Timon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3937>Parmenas,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3532>Nicolas<s%> a <S%G4339>proselyte<s%> of Antioch: <S%G491><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when they had <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> they laid their hands <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G5495><s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G837>increased;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4970>greatly;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>company<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> were <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G450>arose<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the synagogue of the <S%G3032>Libertines,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrenians,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G221>Alexandrians,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G773>Asia,<s%> disputing <S%G4802>with<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were not <S%G2480>able<s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G436>resist<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2980>spake.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> they <S%G5260>suborned<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> which <S%G3004>said,<s%> We have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G989>blasphemous<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> against <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> they stirred <S%G4787>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> came <S%G2186>upon<s%> him, and <S%G4884>caught<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> shall <S%G2647>destroy<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G236>change<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2254>us.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that <S%G2516>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> looking <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> as it had <S%G5616>been<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of an <S%G32>angel.<s%>
